subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Eric Decker, the Jets’ off-season acquisition via the Broncos and Cold Spring, Minn., comes to New York with a country-music-singing wife, a reality TV show and a three-sport past.
snippet: Eric Decker, the Jets’ off-season acquisition via the Broncos and Cold Spring, Minn., comes to New York with a country-music-singing wife, a reality TV show and a three-sport past.
